dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, have you seen the big news about Coventry University? They're, uh, opening a campus in Kazakhstan!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, have you seen the big news about Coventry University? They're, uh, opening a campus in Kazakhstan!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In Kazakhstan, the Coventry University campus project is being implemented with the support of Primus Education, which is investing in the future of education, aligning with Kazakhstans goal of modernizing its education system.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah! I saw that. That's pretty huge, right? What kind of programs are they even offering over there?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah! I saw that. That's pretty huge, right? What kind of programs are they offering over there?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, it's quite a range. They'll have, like, MBA Global Business and Bachelor's degrees. Plus, get this, a British diploma at the end!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, it's quite a range. They'll have, like, M B A Global Business and Bachelor's degrees. Plus, get this, a British diploma at the end!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The university will offer MBA Global Business and Bachelors degree programs, and upon completion of these programs, a British diploma will be issued.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] A British diploma? Wow, that's a big draw. And for the Bachelors, what fields are we talking about?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A British diploma? Wow, that's a big draw. And for the Bachelors, what fields are we talking about?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, they're focusing on areas where Coventry's already a leader, you know? Like business, HR, pedagogy, computer science, digital marketing, that kind of stuff.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, they're focusing on areas where Coventry's already a leader, you know? Like business, H R, pedagogy, computer science, digital marketing, that kind of stuff.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Bachelors degree programs at Coventry University for Kazakhstan will cover disciplines in which the university holds leading positions in world rankings. These include business and human resource management, pedagogy, computer science, information technology management, advertising, digital marketing, and others.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That makes sense. And I also saw something about a special program for teachers?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That makes sense. And I also saw something about a special program for teachers?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's right! It's for an international postgraduate certificate in education, even for school heads. It was developed by NITE in the UK, so it's, like, really official.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's right! It's for an international postgraduate certificate in education, even for school heads. It was developed by N I T E in the U K, so it's, like, really official.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In addition, the university offers a program for teachers, including heads of schools and colleges, to obtain an international postgraduate certificate in education and the status of an internationally qualified teacher. The program was developed by the National Institute of Teaching and Education in the United Kingdom (NITE) and is accredited by the Department of Education in England.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's so crucial, especially with, um, the growing demand for qualified teachers, like Kathy Leach, the British Ambassador, mentioned.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's so crucial, especially with, um, the growing demand for qualified teachers, like Kathy Leach, the British Ambassador, mentioned.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In an era when the demand for qualified teachers is constantly growing, such programs are timely and necessary for the development of education in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. She highlighted how timely and necessary these programs are for Kazakhstan's education development. It really underscores the UK's commitment there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. She highlighted how timely and necessary these programs are for Kazakhstan's education development. It really underscores the U K's commitment there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The opening of British universities and schools, such as Coventry University, here in Kazakhstan underscores our commitment to supporting talent development and building the countrys potential, said Kathy Leach, the British Ambassador to Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And Craig Blyth from Coventry Global Engagement, he talked about using different formats and even AI, like, the latest modern technologies.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Craig Blyth from Coventry Global Engagement, he talked about using different formats and even A I, like, the latest modern technologies.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We work in different regions, so we use different training formats and the latest modern technologies, including those based on artificial intelligence.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and a huge point he made was the affordability. Studying there will be way more affordable than, you know, going abroad when you factor in flights and accommodation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and a huge point he made was the affordability. Studying there will be way more affordable than, you know, going abroad when you factor in flights and accommodation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It should be noted that studying in Kazakhstan will be much more affordable compared to the cost of education abroad, considering the cost of flight and accommodation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Absolutely! And they're offering grants, too, for students with outstanding academic results, or even in sports and arts. That's a game-changer.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely! And they're offering grants, too, for students with outstanding academic results, or even in sports and arts. That's a game-changer.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: University grants will be awarded on a competitive basis to applicants with outstanding academic results, as well as achievements in sports, art, and other fields, confirmed by prize-winning places in Olympiads and competitions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It really is. So, speaking of global, Craig also mentioned Coventry's vast network. Where else do they have a presence?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really is. So, speaking of global, Craig also mentioned Coventry's vast network. Where else do they have a presence?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, like everywhere! China, Morocco, Dubai, Singapore... I mean, Kazakhstan is now officially joining this huge list of global partners.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, like everywhere! China, Morocco, Dubai, Singapore... I mean, Kazakhstan is now officially joining this huge list of global partners.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We have one of the widest networks of partners in the world, including China, Morocco, Africa, Poland, Dubai, Singapore, Brussels, and Egypt. I am glad that Kazakhstan will be included in the list of our global partners, Craig Blyth said in his speech.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That's impressive. And the main Coventry campus in the UK sounds pretty vibrant itself.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's impressive. And the main Coventry campus in the U K sounds pretty vibrant itself.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Super accessible, too! Only 19 minutes from Manchester and London airports, apparently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Super accessible, too! Only nineteen minutes from Manchester and London airports, apparently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our main campus in Coventry is located 19 minutes from Manchester and London, with airports and developed infrastructure nearby.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But the best part, for students in Kazakhstan, is that the quality of education will be exactly the same as the UK campus.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the best part, for students in Kazakhstan, is that the quality of education will be exactly the same as the U K campus.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The quality of education at the universitys campus in Kazakhstan will correspond to the UK campus.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! They said they ensure the quality is always at the same high level, no matter where the campus is. Same benefits, access to all technologies, even simulators.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! They said they ensure the quality is always at the same high level, no matter where the campus is. Same benefits, access to all technologies, even simulators.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our students in Kazakhstan will have the same benefits and opportunities as other campuses abroad. We provide access to all technologies, and many of our students get their first experience in simulators. Kazakhstani students will also have this opportunity, Craig Blyth stressed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Which is fantastic. And all of this is being supported by Primus Education, who are really investing in Kazakhstan's educational future.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is fantastic. And all of this is being supported by Primus Education, who are really investing in Kazakhstan's educational future.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In Kazakhstan, the Coventry University campus project is being implemented with the support of Primus Education, which is investing in the future of education, aligning with Kazakhstans goal of modernizing its education system.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's such a strong move. Coventry's ranked really highly, too, for teaching quality and student experience. They're, like, one of the most innovative modern universities.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's such a strong move. Coventry's ranked really highly, too, for teaching quality and student experience. They're, like, one of the most innovative modern universities.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Coventry University, founded in 1843, is ranked among the worlds leading institutions of higher education by many indicators, including the quality of teaching, the best student experience, the level of interaction with students, and satisfaction in the field of business and management. The latest technologies are widely used at the university. It is recognized as one of the most innovative modern universities, according to Times Higher Education.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, yeah, really exciting times for education in the region, I think.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, yeah, really exciting times for education in the region, I think.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: For sure!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure!
